attributes.title: New users [Filebeat System] ECS
attributes.visState: {"aggs": [{"enabled": true, "params": {}, "id": "1", "schema": "metric", "type": "count"}, {"enabled": true, "params": {"field": "host.hostname", "customLabel": "Host", "orderBy": "1", "size": 5, "order": "desc"}, "id": "2", "schema": "bucket", "type": "terms"}, {"enabled": true, "params": {"field": "user.name", "customLabel": "User", "orderBy": "1", "size": 5, "order": "desc"}, "id": "3", "schema": "bucket", "type": "terms"}, {"enabled": true, "params": {"field": "user.id", "customLabel": "UID", "orderBy": "1", "size": 5, "order": "desc"}, "id": "4", "schema": "bucket", "type": "terms"}, {"enabled": true, "params": {"field": "group.id", "customLabel": "GID", "orderBy": "1", "size": 5, "order": "desc"}, "id": "5", "schema": "bucket", "type": "terms"}, {"enabled": true, "params": {"field": "system.auth.useradd.home", "customLabel": "Home", "orderBy": "1", "size": 5, "order": "desc"}, "id": "6", "schema": "bucket", "type": "terms"}, {"enabled": true, "params": {"field": "system.auth.useradd.shell", "customLabel": "Shell", "orderBy": "1", "size": 5, "order": "desc"}, "id": "7", "schema": "bucket", "type": "terms"}], "type": "table", "params": {"showPartialRows": false, "sort": {"direction": null, "columnIndex": null}, "perPage": 10, "totalFunc": "sum", "showTotal": false, "showMeticsAtAllLevels": false}, "title": "New users ECS", "listeners": {}}
